description.name: Long HSS DIN1869 4.0 x 220mm gold metal twist drill bit
description.long_desc:
A high-quality metal drill bit that meets the expectations of both DIY enthusiasts and professionals. Made from high-speed steel (HSS), it offers not only excellent durability but also high drilling precision. Thanks to its extended design, it allows work in areas inaccessible to standard drill bits and enables the drilling of unusually deep holes.


With a specially ground 130° tip, the bit effectively centers itself on the surface, minimizing the risk of slipping when starting the drilling process. This feature is particularly important when working with harder materials such as structural steel, non-ferrous metals, cast iron, or plastics.


Additionally, the drill bit’s golden color not only gives it an aesthetic appearance but also indicates increased wear resistance and reduced friction during drilling, resulting in longer tool life.


Technical Specifications:



  • Diameter: 4.0 mm

  • Total Length: 220 mm

  • Working Length: 150 mm

  • Tip Angle: 130°

  • Type: HSS DIN1869 – long drill bit


Key Product Features:



  • Material: High-speed steel (HSS) – ensures exceptional durability and wear resistance.

  • Precise Geometry: 130° ground tip for easy centering and improved drilling efficiency.

  • Extended Design: Complies with DIN1869 standard for greater reach and drilling in hard-to-access areas.

  • Versatile Use: Ideal for working with steel, cast iron, non-ferrous metals, and plastics.

  • Enhanced Durability: Gold-colored coating reduces friction and improves heat resistance.



Let me know if you need this adapted for a product listing, brochure, or marketing format!

description.name: Wiertło złote do metalu długie 5.5 x 205mm HSS DIN1869 (50/100/200)
description.long_desc:
Wysokiej jakości wiertło do metalu, które spełni oczekiwania zarówno majsterkowiczów, jak i profesjonalistów. Wykonane ze stali szybkotnącej HSS, zapewnia nie tylko doskonałą trwałość, ale również wysoką precyzję wiercenia. Dzięki przedłużonej konstrukcji, umożliwia pracę w miejscach, do których standardowe wiertła nie sięgają, daje również możliwość wykonywania niestandardowo głębokich otworów.

Dzięki specjalnie szlifowanemu wierzchołkowi o kącie 130°, wiertło skutecznie centruje się na powierzchni, co minimalizuje ryzyko ześlizgiwania się podczas rozpoczęcia wiercenia. To cecha szczególnie istotna podczas pracy z twardszymi materiałami, takimi jak stal konstrukcyjna, metale nieżelazne, żeliwo czy tworzywa sztuczne.

Dodatkowo, złoty kolor wiertła nie tylko nadaje mu estetyczny wygląd, ale także wskazuje na jego zwiększoną odporność na ścieranie oraz redukcję tarcia podczas wiercenia, co przekłada się na dłuższą żywotność narzędzia.

Dane techniczne:

  • Średnica: 5.5 mm
  • Długość całkowita: 205 mm
  • Długość części roboczej: 140 mm
  • Kąt wierzchołka: 130°
  • Typ: HSS DIN1869 – wiertło długie

Najważniejsze cechy produktu:

  • Materiał: Stal szybkotnąca HSS – zapewnia wyjątkową trwałość i odporność na ścieranie.
  • Precyzyjna geometria: Szlifowany wierzchołek pod kątem 130°, ułatwiający centrowanie i zwiększający efektywność wiercenia.
  • Dłuższa konstrukcja: Wiertło spełnia normę DIN1869, co oznacza większy zasięg i możliwość wiercenia w trudno dostępnych miejscach.
  • Uniwersalne zastosowanie: Idealne do obróbki stali, żeliwa, metali nieżelaznych oraz tworzyw sztucznych.
  • Zwiększona wytrzymałość: Powłoka w złotym kolorze redukuje tarcie i poprawia odporność na wysokie temperatury.

Dodatkowo, złoty kolor wiertła nie tylko nadaje mu estetyczny wygląd, ale także wskazuje na jego zwiększoną odporność na ścieranie oraz redukcję tarcia podczas wiercenia, co przekłada się na dłuższą żywotność narzędzia.

Dane techniczne:

  • Średnica: 5.5 mm
  • Długość całkowita: 205 mm
  • Długość części roboczej: 140 mm
  • Kąt wierzchołka: 130°
  • Typ: HSS DIN1869 – wiertło długie

Najważniejsze cechy produktu:

  • Materiał: Stal szybkotnąca HSS – zapewnia wyjątkową trwałość i odporność na ścieranie.
  • Precyzyjna geometria: Szlifowany wierzchołek pod kątem 130°, ułatwiający centrowanie i zwiększający efektywność wiercenia.
  • Dłuższa konstrukcja: Wiertło spełnia normę DIN1869, co oznacza większy zasięg i możliwość wiercenia w trudno dostępnych miejscach.
  • Uniwersalne zastosowanie: Idealne do obróbki stali, żeliwa, metali nieżelaznych oraz tworzyw sztucznych.
  • Zwiększona wytrzymałość: Powłoka w złotym kolorze redukuje tarcie i poprawia odporność na wysokie temperatury.

category.name: Hss Metal Drill Bits

description.name: Long HSS DIN1869 6.0 x 205mm gold metal twist drill bit
description.long_desc:
A high-quality metal drill bit that meets the expectations of both DIY enthusiasts and professionals. Made from high-speed steel (HSS), it offers not only excellent durability but also high drilling precision. Thanks to its extended design, it allows work in areas inaccessible to standard drill bits and enables the drilling of unusually deep holes.


With a specially ground 130° tip, the bit effectively centers itself on the surface, minimizing the risk of slipping when starting the drilling process. This feature is particularly important when working with harder materials such as structural steel, non-ferrous metals, cast iron, or plastics.


Additionally, the drill bit’s golden color not only gives it an aesthetic appearance but also indicates increased wear resistance and reduced friction during drilling, resulting in longer tool life.


Technical Specifications:



  • Diameter: 6.0 mm

  • Total Length: 205 mm

  • Working Length: 140 mm

  • Tip Angle: 130°

  • Type: HSS DIN1869 – long drill bit


Key Product Features:



  • Material: High-speed steel (HSS) – ensures exceptional durability and wear resistance.

  • Precise Geometry: 130° ground tip for easy centering and improved drilling efficiency.

  • Extended Design: Complies with DIN1869 standard for greater reach and drilling in hard-to-access areas.

  • Versatile Use: Ideal for working with steel, cast iron, non-ferrous metals, and plastics.

  • Enhanced Durability: Gold-colored coating reduces friction and improves heat resistance.

With a specially ground 130° tip, the bit effectively centers itself on the surface, minimizing the risk of slipping when starting the drilling process. This feature is particularly important when working with harder materials such as structural steel, non-ferrous metals, cast iron, or plastics.


Additionally, the drill bit’s golden color not only gives it an aesthetic appearance but also indicates increased wear resistance and reduced friction during drilling, resulting in longer tool life.

With a specially ground 130° tip, the bit effectively centers itself on the surface, minimizing the risk of slipping when starting the drilling process. This feature is particularly important when working with harder materials such as structural steel, non-ferrous metals, cast iron, or plastics.


Additionally, the drill bit’s golden color not only gives it an aesthetic appearance but also indicates increased wear resistance and reduced friction during drilling, resulting in longer tool life.


Technical Specifications:



  • Diameter: 12.0 mm

  • Total Length: 295 mm

  • Working Length: 205 mm

  • Tip Angle: 130°

  • Type: HSS DIN1869 – long drill bit


Key Product Features:



  • Material: High-speed steel (HSS) – ensures exceptional durability and wear resistance.

  • Precise Geometry: 130° ground tip for easy centering and improved drilling efficiency.

  • Extended Design: Complies with DIN1869 standard for greater reach and drilling in hard-to-access areas.

  • Versatile Use: Ideal for working with steel, cast iron, non-ferrous metals, and plastics.

  • Enhanced Durability: Gold-colored coating reduces friction and improves heat resistance.

category.path: Health and Safety Articles\Work Gloves

description.name: Goat leather winter gloves, elastic cotton back, velcro cuff s.8
description.long_desc:
Leather winter gloves are the ideal choice for professionals working in demanding weather conditions. Made from the highest quality natural goatskin leather and insulated on the inside, they provide comfort, safety, and durability even in low temperatures.


Product Features:




  • High-Quality Goatskin Leather – The palm area of the glove is made from soft, flexible, and highly durable goatskin leather, ensuring excellent tactile sensitivity and a secure grip on tools.




  • Insulated Interior – The gloves feature a soft insulating layer that protects hands from the cold during outdoor work or in cold storage environments.




  • Velcro Closure – A sturdy Velcro strap at the cuff ensures a perfect fit around the wrist, preventing the gloves from slipping off and blocking cold air from entering.




  • Elastic Cuff – Provides additional wrist protection and makes the gloves easy to put on and take off.




  • Breathable Outer Material – The back of the glove, made from red fabric, allows the hands to breathe, increasing user comfort.




  • Ergonomic Design – Offers a natural range of hand movement and reduces fatigue during prolonged work.




Applications:




  • Assembly and mechanical work




  • Warehouses and production halls




  • Construction work in autumn and winter




  • General outdoor maintenance and technical tasks




Technical Specifications:




  • Material: Goatskin leather + fabric




  • Lining: Insulated




  • Closure: Velcro




  • Size: 8




  • Color: Red and white




  • Standards: CE, EN-388

Applications:




  • Assembly and mechanical work




  • Warehouses and production facilities




  • Construction work




  • General outdoor maintenance and technical tasks




Technical Specifications:




  • Material: Goatskin leather + fabric




  • Closure: Velcro




  • Size: 9




  • Color: Red and white




  • Standards: CE, EN-388
description.short_desc:
Leather gloves are the perfect choice for professionals working in challenging weather environments. Made from top-quality natural goatskin leather, they offer comfort, safety, and durability.


Product Features:




  • Premium Goatskin Leather – The palm area is crafted from soft, flexible, and highly durable goatskin leather, ensuring excellent tactile sensitivity and a secure grip on tools.




  • Velcro Closure – A strong Velcro strap at the cuff allows for a perfect fit around the wrist, preventing the glove from slipping off and blocking cold air from entering.




  • Elastic Cuff – Provides additional wrist protection and ensures easy glove removal and fitting.




  • Breathable Outer Material – The back of the glove, made from red fabric, allows hands to breathe, enhancing user comfort.

description.name: Goat leather long welding gloves
description.long_desc:
Welding gloves are an excellent choice for professional welders and individuals working in environments with high temperatures, flying sparks, and splatter risks. Made from high-quality goatskin leather, they provide durability and effective protection for both hands and forearms.


Key Product Features:




  • Premium goatskin leather – Natural leather offers exceptional resistance to abrasion, tearing, and high temperatures, while remaining soft and comfortable to wear.




  • Long cuff (14") – The extended protective cuff shields not only the hand but also the forearm from heat and sparks generated during welding.




  • One-piece construction – Ergonomic design without unnecessary seams in critical areas enhances work comfort and reduces the risk of chafing.




  • High thermal resistance




  • Soft inner lining – Ensures better comfort during long hours of welding work.




Applications:




  • MIG/MAG, TIG, and MMA welding




  • Plasma cutting, gas cutting, and grinding




  • Foundry and metallurgical work




  • Heavy and metal industry




  • Locksmith and mechanical workshops




Technical Specifications:




  • Material: 100% goatskin leather




  • Glove length: 14 inches (~35 cm)




  • Color: Light grey with red trim




  • Standard: CE, EN 388




  • Size: Universal

description.name: Folding Pliers 3pcs
description.long_desc:
A set of robust pliers is the perfect solution for sheet metal workers, roofers, DIY enthusiasts, and anyone who needs to precisely shape sheet metal. They allow you to easily make bends at 180°, 90°, and 45°. Solid construction and ergonomic design ensure comfortable and precise work.


Features:



  • Precise bending: Enables precise bending of sheet metal at 180°, 90°, and 45° angles.

  • Length: 275 mm - optimal length providing appropriate leverage and precision.

  • Material: #45 Carbon steel (high-quality carbon steel ensuring strength and resistance to deformation).

  • Durable construction: Solid workmanship guarantees a long tool life.

  • Ergonomic design: Ensures comfortable work and a secure grip.

  • Color: Yellow - makes it easy to find the tools in a toolbox.


Purpose/Applications:



  • Sheet metal work: Ideal for shaping sheet metal in sheet metal workshops.

  • Roofing work: Useful for sheet metal processing on roofs.

  • Assembly work: Used for assembling metal elements.

  • DIY: An excellent tool for any DIY enthusiast.

  • Model making: Can be used for precise shaping of sheet metal in model making.


Technical specification:



  • Brand: Keltin

  • Total length: 275 mm

  • Bending angles: 180°, 90°, 45°

  • Material: Carbon steel (high-quality carbon steel)

  • Finish: Powder coated

  • Color: Yellow

  • Handle: Ergonomic, non-slip

description.name: Tactical knife 275/135mm with holster BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES
description.long_desc:
BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES Tactical Knife – Your Reliable Partner in Tough Conditions!


Looking for a tool that can handle any situation? The BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES tactical knife is a versatile, robust, and functional choice for survival enthusiasts, outdoor adventurers, and hikers.


Technical Specifications:



  • Knife Type: Fixed blade

  • Blade Profile: Clip point

  • Blade Type: Straight edge

  • Total Length: 275 mm

  • Blade Length: 135 mm

  • Handle Length: 140 mm

  • Blade Width: 38 mm

  • Blade Thickness: 3.5 mm

  • Weight: 291 g

  • Blade Material: Stainless steel 420J2

  • Handle Material: Plastic (PP+TPR)

  • Sheath: Yes, plastic

  • Additional Features: Compass, fire starter, sharpener


Product Features:


Durable Fixed Blade Design:


The solid construction with a fixed blade ensures durability and reliability in any conditions.


Efficient Blade Performance:



  • Blade Profile: Clip point – ideal for precise cuts and versatile use.

  • Blade Type: Straight edge – perfect for precise and effective cutting.

  • Blade Dimensions: Length of 135 mm, width of 38 mm, and thickness of 3.5 mm, ensuring strength and efficiency.

  • Blade Material: Made of corrosion-resistant 420J2 stainless steel, known for its durability and easy sharpening.


Ergonomic Handle:



  • Handle Length: 140 mm

  • Material: Made from durable plastic (PP+TPR) for a secure grip, even in challenging weather conditions.


Additional Accessories:



  • Built-in Compass: Never lose your direction, even in the wilderness.

  • Fire Starter: Simplifies lighting a fire in the field.

  • Sharpener: Keep your blade sharp and ready for action at all times.


Protective Sheath:


Made from durable plastic, the sheath ensures safe carrying and quick access to the knife.


Why Choose BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES?



  • Multifunctionality: Combines cutting capability with practical survival accessories.

  • Durability and Reliability: High-quality materials designed to withstand tough conditions.

  • Compact Design: Lightweight and portable, with a sheath for convenient carrying.

description.name: Tactical jack-knife 200/85mm with holster BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES
description.long_desc:
BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES Tactical Pocket Knife – Versatility, Functionality, and Durability in One!


If you’re looking for a reliable tool for everyday use, survival, or outdoor activities, the BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES tactical pocket knife is designed to meet all your needs. Compact, lightweight, and practical, it’s your perfect companion.


Technical Specifications:



  • Knife Type: Folding blade

  • Blade Profile: Drop point

  • Blade Type: Straight edge

  • Total Length: 200 mm

  • Blade Length: 85 mm

  • Handle Length: 115 mm

  • Blade Width: 30 mm

  • Blade Thickness: 2.8 mm

  • Weight: 119 g

  • Blade Material: Stainless steel 420J2

  • Handle Material: Aluminum

  • Additional Features: Belt clip, liner lock


Product Features:


Folding Blade Design:


A convenient folding blade ensures ease of carrying and safe use.


Blade Profile:



  • Drop Point: A versatile shape, perfect for both precise cuts and more demanding tasks.

  • Straight Edge: Ideal for cutting a variety of materials with precision.


Durable Blade:



  • Dimensions: Blade length of 85 mm, width of 30 mm, and thickness of 2.8 mm, offering strength and ease of handling.

  • Material: Made from 420J2 stainless steel, resistant to corrosion and easy to sharpen.


Lightweight and Ergonomic Handle:



  • Material: Constructed from aluminum for durability and comfort.

  • Length: 115 mm, perfectly fitting in the hand for a secure grip.


Additional Features:



  • Liner Lock: Secures the blade in the open position for safe usage.

  • Belt Clip: Makes it easy to carry and ensures quick access.


Why Choose BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES?



  • Compact Size: Fits perfectly in your pocket, on your belt, or in your backpack.

  • High Functionality: Combines robustness with modern design.

  • Durable Materials: Tough stainless steel blade and lightweight aluminum handle.


The BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES tactical pocket knife is a tool you can always count on, no matter the situation. Perfect for everyday tasks, outdoor adventures, or camping trips.

description.name: 2in1 tactical folding shovel BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES
description.long_desc:
A reliable companion for every outdoor adventure!


The 2-in-1 Folding Shovel BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES is a versatile tool designed for demanding users who value functionality and compact solutions. It is perfect for survival expeditions, camping trips, hiking, and even daily tasks.


Features and Benefits:




  • Compact Folding Design: When folded, the shovel measures just 19.5 cm in length, making it easy to store in a backpack, car, or on a belt without taking up much space.




  • Adjustable Blade Angle: The blade can be set at a 90° angle to the handle, offering additional functionality and allowing the shovel to double as a hoe.




  • Multi-Purpose Blade: Made from durable steel with dimensions of 16 x 11.5 cm, the blade features a serrated edge that serves as a wood saw, perfect for cutting small branches and roots.




  • Compact Dimensions When Extended: With an overall length of 48 cm, it ensures comfortable and ergonomic use.




  • Lightweight and Durable Construction: High-quality materials guarantee durability and comfort during use.




  • Practical Nylon Sheath: The set includes a weather-resistant sheath for convenient storage and transport.

description.name: Multi-purpose tactical folding shovel BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES
description.long_desc:
The Foldable Multifunctional Shovel BLACK SURVIVAL SERIES is an indispensable tool for survival enthusiasts, bushcraft lovers, tourists, and those engaging in fieldwork. With its compact design, durable materials, and extensive features, it performs exceptionally well in both extreme outdoor conditions and everyday use. It's an excellent choice for individuals who value practicality, durability, and comfort.


Technical Specifications:



  • Folded dimensions: 25 x 13 cm

  • Extended length: 44.5 / 60 / 75.5 cm (three adjustable modes)

  • Blade dimensions: 16 x 13 cm

  • Blade material: 3CR13 stainless steel

  • Steel hardness: 48-53 HRC

  • Additional features: window breaker, fire starter, whistle, knife, wrenches (10 mm, 13 mm, 14 mm), wood saw, sharpened blade edge

  • Included accessories: nylon sheath, protective gloves


Key Features:


Compact Design with Adjustable Length:



  • When folded, the tool measures only 25 cm, making it extremely easy to transport.

  • Adjust the length to your needs: 44.5 cm, 60 cm, or 75.5 cm. This makes the shovel suitable for both small tasks and challenging fieldwork.


Versatile Blade Made of Hardened 3CR13 Stainless Steel:



  • Durable stainless steel with a hardness of 48-53 HRC provides enhanced resistance to mechanical damage and corrosion.

  • Adjustable blade angle (90° and 45°) allows the tool to function as a shovel, hoe, or pickaxe.

  • Side edges of the blade: one serrated for wood sawing, the other sharpened for cutting and splitting.

  • Integrated wrenches (10 mm, 13 mm, and 14 mm) and a bottle opener add extra utility.


Survival Features for Any Situation:



  • Equipped with a window breaker, fire starter, whistle, and knife.

  • The waterproof handle, sealed with O-rings, allows storage of items such as matches, kindling, and other moisture-sensitive small essentials.


Comfort and Safety in Use:



  • Ergonomic design ensures comfortable operation in all conditions.

  • The included durable protective gloves enhance comfort and safety during use.


Convenient Storage and Transportation:



  • Includes a nylon sheath resistant to mechanical damage and moisture, ensuring convenient transport of the tool.
